title: Red line
brief_description: Carlton - ‘Imagine if there was a red line behind you’. Short narrative work presenting personal story from Carlton and Parkville. This film is an excerpt from ‘Stories from the hidden city’, a project conceived and directed by Bagryana Popov, 2000-2002.
